title: MS60012: Semiconductor Technology - Quick Facts
text:
MS60012
Course name | Semiconductor Technology
Offered by | Materials Science
Credits | 4
L-T-P | 3-1-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: None Introduction to polymer reaction engineering; types of polymerization; basic polymerization kinetics, control and analysis of polymerization reaction, molecular weight. MWD, chain branching, cross linking/gelation. Polymerization reactors, types and mode of operation. Polymerization reactor design, control of polymerization. Storage and handling of raw materials; considerations for design, safety and installation of storage facility for monomers, solvents and catalysts, transport systems. Post polymerization unit operations and unit processes : Cleaning and maintenance of polymerization reactors and pipe lines.
